name: You'll go to amazing places, Art Print (Girls)
description:
This design has been digitally drawn by hand and is available in 3 sizes:

8"x10" 
A4 
A3

It is printed on 250gsm lightly textured, 100% cotton fine art paper produced in France and printed using high quality dye based inks to maintain vibrancy for years to come.

Each art print has a white margin around the edge (approximately 1.5cm) for framing. The actual size of the 8"x10" illustration is 16cm x 21cm, A4 illustration is 16.5cm x 25.5cm and the A3 illustration is 25cm x 35.5cm.

DIY FRAMING:

8"x10" prints fit perfectly in Country Road's range of 8"x10" frames (used inside the mount) or any other 8"x10" size frame (suggestions include Profile frames from Myer/David Jones or frames from Target, Harvey Norman or your local photo shop).

A4 prints fit in Ikea's range of 30cm x 40cm frames (when used inside mount) or any other A4 sized frame.

A3 art prints fit in Ikea's range of 40cm x 50cm frames (when used inside mount).

Alternatively you may wish to take your print to your local framer for a custom option.

All Poppy Studio prints are packed on heavy duty backing board and shipped in a cellophane sleeve in a rigid envelope for safe travels.

The print is signed by the designer, Nicole Kerley, together with the year of print in the bottom left corner.

Please Note: On occasion there may be slight colour variations from your computer screen to print.

All artwork © Nicole Kerley. Poppy Studio. Thank you

name: Sydney Ferry Art Print
description:
This design has been digitally drawn by hand and is available unframed in 3 sizes:

8"x10" 
A4 
A3

All Poppy Studio art prints are printed on 250gsm lightly textured, 100% cotton fine art paper produced in France and printed using high quality dye based inks to maintain vibrancy for years to come.

Each art print has a white margin around the edge (approximately 1.5cm) for framing. The actual size of the 8"x10" illustration is 16cm x 21cm and is printed on an A4 sheet with a lightly printed border to assist with framing. The A4 illustration is 16.5cm x 25.5cm (on A4 sheet) and the A3 illustration is 25cm x 35.5cm (on A3 sheet).

Framing options:

8"x10" prints fit perfectly in Country Road's range of 8"x10" frames (used inside the mount) or any other 8"x10" size frame (suggestions include Profile frames from Myer/David Jones or frames from Freedom, Target, Harvey Norman or your local photo shop).

A4 prints fit in Ikea's range of 30cm x 40cm frames (when used inside mount) or any other A4 sized frame. 
A3 prints fit in Ikea's range of 40cm x 50cm frames (when used inside mount).

Alternatively you may wish to take your print to your local framer for a custom option.

All Poppy Studio prints are packed on heavy duty backing board and shipped in a cellophane sleeve in a rigid envelope for safe travels.

The print is signed by the designer, Nicole Kerley, together with the year of print in the bottom left corner.

Please Note: On occasion there may be slight colour variations from your computer screen to print.

All artwork copyright Nicole Kerley and Poppy Studio.

name: Sunshine on my Window Art Print (for girls)
description:
This design has been digitally drawn by hand and is available in 3 sizes:

8"x10" 
A4 
A3

It is printed on 250gsm lightly textured, 100% cotton fine art paper produced in France and printed using high quality dye based inks to maintain vibrancy for years to come.

Each art print has a white margin around the edge (approximately 1.5cm) for framing. The actual size of the 8"x10" illustration is 16cm x 21cm, A4 illustration is 16.5cm x 25.5cm and the A3 illustration is 25cm x 35.5cm.

DIY FRAMING:

8"x10" prints fit perfectly in Country Road's range of 8"x10" frames (used inside the mount) or any other 8"x10" size frame (suggestions include Profile frames from Myer/David Jones or frames from Target, Harvey Norman or your local photo shop).

A4 prints fit in Ikea's range of 30cm x 40cm frames (when used inside mount) or any other A4 sized frame.

A3 art prints fit in Ikea's range of 40cm x 50cm frames (when used inside mount).

Alternatively you may wish to take your print to your local framer for a custom option.

All Poppy Studio prints are packed on heavy duty backing board and shipped in a cellophane sleeve in a rigid envelope for safe travels.

name: 'Poss on branch' Personalised Art Print
description:
If you have family and friends with little ones in far off places and would like to send them a little piece of Oz, then this personalised print makes for the perfect gift. It's sure to be something they won't have already received and if your friends/family are originally from Oz, they will love it.

This was originally designed for my Auntie to send to family in Scotland to welcome their new baby daughter.

A3

It is printed on 250gsm lightly textured, 100% cotton fine art paper produced in France and printed using high quality dye based inks to maintain vibrancy for years to come.

Each art print has a white margin around the edge (approximately 1.5cm) for framing. The actual size of the 8"x10" illustration is 16cm x 21cm, A4 illustration is 16.5cm x 25.5cm and the A3 illustration is 25cm x 35.5cm.

DIY FRAMING:

8"x10" prints fit perfectly in Country Road's range of 8"x10" frames (used inside the mount) or any other 8"x10" size frame (suggestions include Profile frames from Myer/David Jones or frames from Target, Harvey Norman or your local photo shop).

A4 prints fit in Ikea's range of 30cm x 40cm frames (when used inside mount) or any other A4 sized frame.

A3 art prints fit in Ikea's range of 40cm x 50cm frames (when used inside mount).

Alternatively you may wish to take your print to your local framer for a custom option.

All Poppy Studio prints are packed on heavy duty backing board and shipped in a cellophane sleeve in a rigid envelope for safe travels.

The print is signed by the designer, Nicole Kerley, together with the year of print in the bottom left corner.

Please Note: On occasion there may be slight colour variations from your computer screen to print.

All artwork © Nicole Kerley. Poppy Studio. Thank you.
